items.q: Fill in the blank: ___ going to be late if they don't hurry.
Fill in the blank: The students forgot ___ homework at home.
Fill in the blank: We should meet over ___ by the entrance.
Choose the sentence that is completely correct.
options: There going to announce there decision tomorrow.
Their going to announce they're decision tomorrow.
They're going to announce their decision tomorrow.
They're going to announce there decision tomorrow.

items.q: Identify the sentence with the error.
options: There is a new restaurant on the corner.
They're planning a trip next month.
Their is a new movie out this weekend.

items.q: Fill in the blanks: '___ house is on that hill, and ___ sure you'll see it from ___.'
Choose the sentence that uses all three correctly.
options: There over their, trying to find they're seats.
Their over there, trying to find there seats.
They're over their, trying to find there seats.
They're over there, trying to find their seats.

items.q: Which statement correctly explains the three forms?
options: 'There' shows possession; 'their' is a contraction; 'they're' refers to place.
'Their' shows possession; 'they're' = 'they are'; 'there' refers to place or introduces a sentence.
They're shows place; there shows possession; their is a contraction.
All three mean the same and are interchangeable.

items.q: Fill in the blank: ___ are many reasons to visit this city.
Fill in the blank: I don't know if ___ ready for the exam.
Identify the correct sentence.
options: Is that they're dog over their?
Is that their dog over there?
Is that there dog over their?
Is that their dog over they're?

items.q: Choose the best correction: 'Their going to loose there tickets if they leave them there.'
options: Their going to lose their tickets if they leave them there.
They're going to lose their tickets if they leave them there.
There going to lose they're tickets if they leave them their.
They're going to loose their tickets if they leave them their.

items.q: Fill in the blanks: '___ no way to know ___ true feelings from ___ expressions.'
Identify the sentence that contains two errors.
options: There going to show off there new car at the party.
They're going to show off their new car at the party.
They're going to show off there new car at the party.
There going to show off their new car at the party.

items.q: Which rule helps you check if 'they're' is correct?
options: Replace it with 'their' and see if it fits.
Replace it with 'they are' and see if it fits.
Replace it with 'there are' and see if it fits.
Replace it with 'there' and see if it fits.

items.q: Choose the sentence that is completely correct.
options: They're happy because their trip starts when they get there.
There happy because they're trip starts when they get their.
Their happy because there trip starts when they get they're.
They're happy because there trip starts when they get their.

items.q: Fill in the blanks: 'I think ___ late because ___ still looking for ___ keys.'
Identify the sentence that is completely correct.
options: There going to present their ideas when they're ready.
They're going to present their ideas when there ready.
They're going to present their ideas when they're ready.
Their going to present there ideas when they're ready.

items.q: In the sentence 'There are students who forget their books when they're in a hurry', what does the first 'There' do?
In the same sentence, what does 'they're' stand for?
